homepage.title: Integrated technological solutions for optimal performance of your business.
homepage.subtitle: Don't let technology hold you back! Modernize your tools for greater efficiency, competitiveness, and profitability.

transition-elem.audit: Audit and consulting in digital transformation

infras-elem.configuration: Network configuration layer 2 and 3 (VLAN, VPN, FIREWALL,...)
infras-elem.servers: Server installation and configuration (VMware, Proxmox, Docker, Kubernetes, VMware Tanzu)

relation.title: Client Relationship
relation.description: Our commitment is to support you with tailor-made services, designed to precisely meet your needs and the specific challenges of your business. Through a personalized approach, we offer you scalable solutions, responsive support, and rigorous follow-up.

relation-menu.tracking-desc: We adapt our solutions to your needs by offering you a personalized and scalable service. Benefit from dedicated support to optimize your IT environment and quickly integrate new features as your business evolves.
relation-menu.warranty-desc: Benefit from a 6-month warranty on our services and solutions, ensuring peace of mind. Our commitment is to provide you with a reliable and sustainable IT environment, with complete peace of mind.
relation-menu.security-desc: The protection of your data is our priority. Our solutions ensure a high level of security to preserve the integrity and confidentiality of your sensitive information.
relation-menu.experience-desc: During our training, we placed paramount importance on the client relationship. Through practical scenarios, we developed our collaboration skills and strengthened our soft skills, which are essential for effective and professional communication.

aboutpage.title: About us
aboutpage.top-description1: We are an association of four independent students, currently in our first year of a Master's degree in IT systems architecture. Graduated in 2024 with a Bachelor's degree in IT technology from Henallux, we combine our skills and passion to offer solutions tailored to your needs.
aboutpage.top-description2: Thanks to our complementary expertise, we cover various fields: networking, web development, IoT, and system administration (Linux and Windows). This synergy allows us to support your company in its technological challenges and optimize its performance with innovative solutions.

nini.name: Jaunart Noé
nini.description: Passionate about IT from a young age, I celebrated my 20th birthday at the end of 2024. Motivated by the realization of projects outside the academic framework, I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in IT Architecture, after obtaining a Bachelor's degree in IT Technology. I want to develop solid expertise in the design and optimization of IT systems. Curious and motivated, I am particularly attracted to infrastructure and Cloud. I like to take on new challenges to innovate and provide effective solutions.

ervinou.name: Gjoni Ervin
ervinou.description: Passionate about technology and innovation, I have been evolving in the IT field for several years. Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Systems Architecture at Hénallux, I have acquired solid expertise in networks, programming, cybersecurity, IoT, and web development. Alongside my studies, I have also been able to work professionally in IT, which has allowed me to develop a rigorous and effective approach to solving technical problems and optimizing equipment performance.

lvca.name: Abs Luca
lvca.description:
With a strong foundation in IT systems, I specialize in development, system administration, and network management. I am proficient in several programming languages, including Python, Java, C, HTML/JS (React Vite), PHP, SQL, and Kotlin for mobile applications. My technical skills extend to both Linux and Windows environments, with practical experience in cybersecurity and network configuration using Cisco, Ubiquiti, Palo Alto, and various firewall solutions.
I gained professional experience at IBA, where I worked as a student and later as an intern for my Bachelor's thesis. This allowed me to contribute to infrastructure, and software development projects in a real-world setting, reinforcing my technical and problem-solving abilities.
Always eager to explore and innovate, I continuously seek out new challenges. I am currently challenging my-self through through a Master’s degree in IT Systems Architecture with my three colleagues.

sac.name: Van Eenoo Arnaud
sac.description: Passionate about IT forever, I am driven by the desire to actively contribute to the digital world around us. Currently pursuing a Master's degree in IT Systems Architecture following the completion of a Bachelor's degree in IT Technology, I have developed solid expertise in the design and optimization of digital infrastructures. Curious and motivated, I am constantly seeking new challenges to innovate, provide effective solutions, and secure our digital footprint.

projectspage.title: Projects
projectspage.description-pt1: Throughout our projects, we have had the opportunity to collaborate with companies and organizations with diverse needs. Each achievement is the result of attentive listening, a tailored approach, and the implementation of our technical skills.
projectspage.description-pt2: Discover below some of our collaborations, which illustrate our ability to turn ideas into concrete solutions.

belgium-airsoft.title: BELGIUM AIRSOFT
belgium-airsoft.description: The Belgium Airsoft project was initiated by one of the founders of 4cores. The platform offers advice, equipment comparisons, and a practical guide to help both beginners and experienced players discover all aspects of airsoft safely.

eurogreen.title: EUROGREEN
eurogreen.description: Eurogreen is a company specialized in public works, particularly in the creation and development of green spaces. Founded in 1990 and based in Sombreffe, the company has a team of professional gardeners, a design office, a technical department with a landscape architect, and a mechanical workshop.

eyup.title: PLAFONNAGE EYUP OZDIL
eyup.description: This project concerns the services offered by Plafonnage Eyup Ozdil SRL. The company specializes in interior plastering services for new constructions and renovations, the installation of partition walls in plasterboard or insulating materials, and the application of coatings.

cookiepage.title: Cookie Policy
cookiepage.description: We have chosen to use as few cookies as possible to preserve your privacy. We do not integrate any cookies for advertising purposes, data reselling, or intrusive tracking, as these practices go against our values. Our priority is to offer you a respectful and anonymous browsing experience. Only cookies strictly necessary for the proper functioning of the site may be used, and you always have control over their management.
cookiepage.name: Cookie name

cookie-consent.name: cookieConsent
cookie-consent.description: Cookie used to verify user consent regarding the use of cookies.

cookie-ga.name: _ga
cookie-ga.description: Cookies used to measure website audience. They are only activated with the user's consent and are deleted if consent is not given.

banner.title: Your privacy is important to us!
banner.description: This website only uses essential cookies to remember your preferred language and to collect audience statistics.
